version_description: Welcome to Rise of Cultures!
Welcome to Rise of Cultures!
Welcome to Rise of Cultures!
We have made improvements to some graphics to make the game even prettier! :)
We have made improvements to some graphics to make the game even prettier! :)
We have made improvements to some graphics to make the game even prettier! :)

- Hola, Ciao, Hoi and Привет! The game can now be enjoyed in four new languages: Spanish, Italian, Dutch and Russian :).
- Forge powerful Alliances and lead your Culture to true greatness!

- Hola, Ciao, Hoi and Привет! The game can now be enjoyed in four new languages: Spanish, Italian, Dutch and Russian :).
- Forge powerful Alliances and lead your Culture to true greatness!

- Hola, Ciao, Hoi and Привет! The game can now be enjoyed in four new languages: Spanish, Italian, Dutch and Russian :).
- Forge powerful Alliances and lead your Culture to true greatness!

- Bind your account to the GameCenter to protect your progress!
- Use more convenient resource amount pickers, to trade for or buy resources that are necessary to complete a given action.
- Compare yourself and your alliance to others in the new leaderboards!
Thank you for playing Rise of Cultures!

- Bind your account to the GameCenter to protect your progress!

- Compare yourself and your alliance to others in the new leaderboards!

- Use more convenient resource amount pickers, to trade for or buy resources that are necessary to complete a given action.

Experience mankind’s history firsthand in Rise of Cultures!
In the latest version:
- Connect with the RoC community with ease, thanks to convenient links in the settings menu.
- No more accidental exits from the move mode. If you have buildings in stash, the game now asks you to confirm.
- The Hydra Monument can now be sold, if you are so inclined.
Thank you for playing!

Thank you for playing!

Experience mankind’s history firsthand in Rise of Cultures!
In the latest version:
- Connect with the RoC community with ease, thanks to convenient links in the settings menu.
- No more accidental exits from the move mode. If you have buildings in stash, the game now asks you to confirm.
- The Hydra Monument can now be sold, if you are so inclined.
Thank you for playing!

In this update, we focused a lot on the special buildings - such as Wonders, the Hydra Monument, and the Town Hall. They just started behaving much nicer: instead of resetting their ongoing production after an upgrade, they will complete it immediately for you to collect!
It's also easier to see the Hydra Monument collection, as it's now done with a separate tap.

Thank you for playing!
